name: Fire Defender
description:
Entry for  the GMTK Game jam 2020!

Save the buildings from certain doom!
use your 3 difrentcursor weapons to surivive as long as you can and get a high score!

Gameplay:

Use your fire hose  to put out the fires that appear from the windows, but be careful! once the fire is put out the person in the window will JUMP OUT! and you have to catch him with the Net.

Also... I heard there's UFO's in this game, maybe the crosshair weapon has something to do with that.

Keep the screen as clear as possible before things get OUT OF CONTROL (wink wink)

Controls:

Q - Previous weapon
E - Next weapon
1 - Water hose weapon
2 - Net to catch people!
3 - Crosshair to shoot missiles at UFO's
